strapiPost.title: Razorback Football 2022 Dates Released
strapiPost.content:
Get out your pens because some important Razorback football dates for 2022 have been released. 

  • Warming up: Sunday, March 13 will mark Head Coach Sam Pittman’s third season leading the Razorbacks with their first spring 2022 practice. On April 16, Arkansas will host a free, open practice inside Donald W. Reynolds Razorback Stadium, and that date alone could be the public’s only opportunity to see the Hogs on the field this spring. 
  • Kick-off: The Razorbacks will open the 2022 season at home after finishing last season ranked within the AP Top 25. The game is Sept. 3 against Cincinnati. Family weekend is scheduled for Sept. 16-18, the weekend the Hogs will take on Missouri State.
